excerpts: For our entrees we had Kung Pao Chicken and Black Pepper Pork.
black pepper pork.author: Jason M.
black pepper pork.review:
When we walked in, we were blown away by how vast it seemed. We instantly thought that this would be a great venue for a party! The menu took a while to get through. We finally decided on pot stickers as an appetizer. For our entrees we had Kung Pao Chicken and Black Pepper Pork. They were all delicious!

We'll definitely be back to try some of the other dishes. They're still waiting on their alcohol license, and once that happens, I can see this place being one of our favorites.

excerpts: Get the beef short rib with honey black pepper sauce -- it was recommended by the waitress and pretty well floored me.
Succulent and rich cuts of meat, and big portions.
I also enjoyed the beef pancake appetizer and the chicken with explosive peppers (spicy!).
Great service, cool interior, overall fantastic experience.
beef short rib with honey black pepper s.author: Uli Z.
beef short rib with honey black pepper s.review: Hot damn that was good! Get the beef short rib with honey black pepper sauce -- it was recommended by the waitress and pretty well floored me. Succulent and rich cuts of meat, and big portions. I also enjoyed the beef pancake appetizer and the chicken with explosive peppers (spicy!). Great service, cool interior, overall fantastic experience. Highly recommended.

excerpts: We order" Beef with Five Spicy Flavors",and " Fish Fillets with Explosive Chili Peppers".
All are very good , Super spicy and tasty !!
Also my wife asked for a "Steamed Pork Rib with Mushroom," which is very good, but not spicy, this is my wife likes a dish.
fish fillets with explosive chili pepper.author: Eric W.
fish fillets with explosive chili pepper.review:
Because I bought a groupon, so I went to this place for lunch, otherwise I don't know this place who is very good restaurant..Of course, if you like hot that you will like it. if you don't like hot , you like this place too, because it is comfortable. It is a Sichuan restaurant, So, most of the food is spicy.
We order" Beef with Five Spicy Flavors",and " Fish Fillets with Explosive Chili Peppers".  All are very good , Super spicy and tasty !! Just the way I like. Also my wife asked for a "Steamed Pork Rib with Mushroom," which is very good, but not spicy, this is my wife likes a dish.
The service is slow. But The food and price is amazing!!

因為我買了Groupon，所以我去了這個地方吃午飯，否則,我不知道這個地方是非常好的餐廳。當然，如果你喜歡辣，你會喜歡它。如果你不喜歡熱，你喜歡這個地方也一樣，因為它是舒適. 這是一家川菜館, 所以, 多數的食物是辣的.
我們點了"五香牛腱",及 "重慶辣子魚片". 所有的都非常好，超級辣，美味！另外我太太要了"雲耳鮮菇蒸排骨", 這是非常好的，但不是辣, 這是我的妻子喜歡的一個菜.
該餐廳服務是太慢。但食品和價格是好而不太貴！
